TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Behavior extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示由 管理的 对象。

span.span: Represents the objects that are managed by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以扩展此类以开发任何类型的用户界面行为，包括选择、拖动和调整大小行为。This class can be extended to develop any type of user interface behavior, including selection, drag, and resize behaviors. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [行为服务概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f). > [!NOTE] > 类型必须与类型相关联 。Your type must be associated with a type. 不支持与标志符号无关的行为。Glyph-independent behaviors are not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何基于 响应用户单击的类创建自己的类。The following code example demonstrates how to create your own class based on the class that responds to user clicks. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 父行为是由维护的行为堆栈上的下一行为 。The parent behavior is the next behavior on the behavior stack maintained by the . 如果 `callParentBehavior` 参数为 `true` ，则 `behaviorService` 参数不能为 `null` 。If the `callParentBehavior` parameter is `true`, then the `behaviorService` parameter must not be `null`. `callParentBehavior` 指示基类是否 应调用父行为，然后允许 选择正确的父行为。`callParentBehavior` indicates whether the base class should call the parent behavior, and then allow the select the correct parent behavior.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether objects should be disabled.

span.span: if all objects the designer receives should have states set to Enabled = false when this is active; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true`属性的值 指示 当此行为处于活动状态时，设计器接收的所有对象都应禁用其状态。A `true` value for the property indicates to the that all objects the designer receives should have their state disabled when this behavior is active. 属性与方法结合使用 ，因此您可以自定义标志符号和行为之间的交互。The property works in conjunction with the method so you can customize the interaction between glyphs and behaviors. 下表汇总了针对特定的调用的结果 。The following table summarizes the results of a call to for a particular . || 为 `true` is `true`| 为 `false` is `false`| |-|-|-| |命中测试标志符号具有分配的行为Hit-tested glyph has an assigned behavior|如果在中 找到了具有指定的，则会 `command ID` 禁用并返回。If the with the specified `command ID` is found in the , that is disabled and returned. 否则将返回 `null`。Otherwise, `null` is returned.| 对行为调用，如果找到，则返回行为的 。 is called on the behavior and, if found, the behavior's is returned. 否则， 返回具有指定的结果 `command ID` 。Otherwise, the result of with the specified `command ID` is returned.| |命中测试标志符号没有分配的行为Hit-tested glyph has no assigned behavior|返回具有指定的的结果 `command ID` 。The result of with the specified `command ID` is returned.|返回具有指定的的结果 `command ID` 。The result of with the specified `command ID` is returned.|

span.span: The default implementation always returns .

summary.span: 在丢失鼠标捕获时由装饰器窗口调用。

span.span: Called by the adorner window when it loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行为可以通过行为服务请求鼠标捕获，方法是使用方法将自身推送到行为堆栈上 。A behavior can request mouse capture through the behavior service by pushing itself onto the behavior stack with the method. 如果是这样，则 在捕获丢失时，会通过方法通知。If it does so, it will be notified through the method when capture is lost. 通常情况下，该行为会将其自身从堆栈中移除。Generally the behavior removes itself from the stack at this time. 当发生下列操作之一时，捕获会丢失：Capture is lost when one of the following actions occurs: - 其他人请求捕获。Someone else requests capture. - 推送另一行为。Another behavior is pushed. - 此行为已被删除。This behavior is removed. 在上述每种情况下， 将对行为调用。In each of these cases, will be called on the behavior.

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

summary.span: 在任何双击消息进入 的装饰器窗口时调用。

span.span: Called when any double-click message enters the adorner window of the .

returns.span: 如果消息已处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the message was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当任何双击消息进入的装饰器窗口的时，将调用方法 `WndProc` 。The method is called when any double-click message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 消息首先传递到最顶层的 行为堆栈中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. `true`从此方法返回表示消息已由处理 并且不应继续处理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 此时，消息将发送到适当的行为。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理双击消息。The following code example demonstrates how to handle a double-click message. 有关完整的代码清单，请参阅 [如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171820(v=vs.120))。For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171820(v=vs.120)). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs/CS/DesignerDemoControl.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs/VB/DesignerDemoControl.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当任何鼠标按下消息进入的 `WndProc` 装饰器窗口的时，将调用方法 。The method is called when any mouse-down message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 消息首先传递到最顶层的 行为堆栈中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. `true`从此方法返回表示消息已由处理 并且不应继续处理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 此时，消息将发送到适当的行为。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当任何鼠标悬停消息进入的装饰器窗口的时，将调用方法 `WndProc` 。The method is called when any mouse-hover message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 消息首先传递到最顶层的 行为堆栈中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. `true`从此方法返回表示消息已由处理 并且不应继续处理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 此时，消息将发送到适当的行为。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
